document_data.name: Tann
document_data.home:
[[Graveyard (Mere of Dead Men)|Unnamed graveyard]],
[[Mere of Dead Men]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Commander Tann''' was a [[human]] commander of [[Fort Locke]] near the [[Mere of Dead Men]] on the [[Sword Coast North]].
document_data.History:
Tann was the commander of Fort Locke until he vanished on a patrol. A [[Unnamed shadow priest|shadow priest]] captured him and his men [[Blaine]], [[Bruneil]], and [[Garret]].

When the [[Kalach-Cha]] arrived, Tann was held captive and needed to be rescued. Once done, the Kalach-Cha could've searched for his men. However, upon returning coming to [[Fort Locke]], [[Vallis]] would be displeased Tann had returned and would imprison him. The Kalach-Cha could've fought Vallis or persuaded his men to put their weapons down.
